verses.verse: A Psalm of David.<WH1732> Unto<WH413> thee will I cry,<WH7121> O LORD<WH3068> my rock;<WH6697> be not<WH408> silent<WH2790> to<WH4480> me: lest,<WH6435> if thou be silent<WH2790> to<WH4480> me, I become like<WH4911> <WH5973> them that go down<WH3381> into the pit.<WH953>
Hear <WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of my supplications,<WH8469> when I cry<WH7768> unto<WH413> thee, when I lift up<WH5375> my hands<WH3027> toward<WH413> thy holy<WH6944> oracle.<WH1687>

Draw <WH4900> me not<WH408> away with<WH5973> the wicked,<WH7563> and with<WH5973> the workers<WH6466> of iniquity,<WH205> which speak<WH1696> peace<WH7965> to<WH5973> their neighbors,<WH7453> but mischief<WH7451> is in their hearts.<WH3824>

Give <WH5414> them according to their deeds,<WH6467> and according to the wickedness<WH7455> of their endeavors:<WH4611> give<WH5414> them after the work<WH4639> of their hands;<WH3027> render<WH7725> to them their desert.<WH1576>

Because <WH3588> they regard<WH995> <WH413> not<WH3808> the works<WH6468> of the LORD,<WH3068> nor the operation<WH4639> of his hands,<WH3027> he shall destroy<WH2040> them, and not<WH3808> build them up.<WH1129>
Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD,<WH3068> because<WH3588> he hath heard<WH8085> the voice<WH6963> of my supplications.<WH8469>

The LORD<WH3068> is my strength<WH5797> and my shield;<WH4043> my heart<WH3820> trusted<WH982> in him, and I am helped:<WH5826> therefore my heart<WH3820> greatly rejoiceth;<WH5937> and with my song<WH4480> <WH7892> will I praise<WH3034> him.
The LORD<WH3068> is their strength,<WH5797> and he<WH1931> is the saving<WH3444> strength<WH4581> of his anointed.<WH4899>
Save <WH3467> <WH853> thy people,<WH5971> and bless<WH1288> <WH853> thine inheritance:<WH5159> feed<WH7462> them also, and lift them up<WH5375> forever.<WH5704> <WH5769>
